entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:11 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
